Welcome to the Honeywell Connected Quarterly newsletter, where you can catch up on Honeywell’s latest Connected Aircraft updates. Want to learn more or schedule an executive interview? Just click "Contact Us" at the bottom of the page to send us a response directly. What people really think about in-flight Wi-Fi People are tired of slow, unreliable in-flight Wi-Fi. But don’t take it from us. We hit the streets of New York City to ask everyday passengers what they think of in-flight connectivity. Bringing connectivity to new Emirates aircraft Learn which aircraft Emirates will equip with global, high-speed in-flight Wi-Fi, powered by Honeywell’s JetWave hardware. Air travel myths and curiosities Jon Snow might know nothing, and many flyers don’t know much about air travel either. Working on your 2018 preview stories?
